primarySegments.name: Busy Professionals
primarySegments.description: Dog owners with demanding jobs who need reliable dog walking services during work hours.

problemsNeeds: Lack of time to walk their dogs
Need for trustworthy and reliable service
Desire for real-time updates on their dog's activities
behaviors: Frequent app users during work hours
Engage with customer reviews and ratings

primarySegments.name: Elderly Dog Owners
primarySegments.description: Older adults who may have physical limitations and require assistance with dog walking.

problemsNeeds: Desire for companionship and social interaction
behaviors: Use app with assistance or simplified interface
Engage in feedback to improve service

primarySegments.name: Young Urban Dwellers
primarySegments.description: Young adults living in urban areas who own dogs and have active lifestyles.

behaviors: Engage with social media and app promotions
Provide feedback and share experiences online
